title: Hit - the third case
Hit - The Third Case
synopsis: Arjun Sarkaar is imprisoned for an unspecified crime. In jail, he is saved by a fellow prisoner named Samuel Joseph from being harmed by inmates he had previously arrested. Later Arjun narrates his story to Joseph through a series of flashbacks.

title: Retro
synopsis: Retro (2025) is a Tamil action-drama directed by Karthik Subbaraj starring Suriya as Paarivel Kannan, a gangster raised in 1960s Thoothukudi who attempts to abandon his violent life for his lover, Rukmini (Pooja Hegde). The plot follows his struggle to reform while facing his past, featuring themes of love, war, and vengeance.

title: Brahmotsavam
synopsis: Brahmotsavam is a family-oriented drama that celebrates relationships, traditions, and values. The film follows the life of a wealthy joint family and highlights emotional bonds, conflicts, and the importance of togetherness in modern society.
actress: Kajal Aggarwal, Samantha Ruth Prabhu, Pranitha Subhash

title: Devara
synopsis: A village chief's son secretly continues his father's mission to end smuggling, while pretending to be weak and maintaining the illusion that his father is still alive
A village chief's son secretly continues his father's mission to end smuggling, while pretending to be weak and maintaining the illusion that his father is still alive.

title: Rajasaab
synopsis: The Raja Saab (2026) is a Telugu horror-romance film where Raju (Prabhas) searches for his estranged grandfather, Kanakaraju (Sanjay Dutt), to fulfill his Alzheimer's-stricken grandmother's wish. The journey leads him to a haunted mansion in Hyderabad, where he discovers his grandfather is a dark, supernatural entity who trapped.

title: OG
synopsis: hey Call Him OG (2025) is a high-octane Telugu action drama directed by Sujeeth, starring Pawan Kalyan as Ojas Gambheera a lethal, Samurai-trained gangster. The story follows OG as he returns from a self-imposed exile in the 1990s to protect his found family and city from violent rival mob bosses, specifically Omi Bhau (Emraan Hashmi).

trailer.title: Kantara
trailer.synopsis: Kantara is a Kannada action thriller set in a fictional village in the coastal forests of Karnataka. It explores the conflict between humans and nature, revolving around a demigod tradition and a man who must protect his land and culture.

trailer.title: Gymkhana
trailer.synopsis: Gymkhana is a sports-comedy drama about a group of youngsters who fail their exams and decide to join a boxing gym to secure college admission through the sports quota. What follows is a journey of friendship, discipline, rivalry, and self-discovery inside the boxing ring.

trailer.title: O' Romeo
trailer.synopsis: O' Romeo (2026) is a crime thriller directed by Vishal Bhardwaj. The film is a riveting tale of love, betrayal, and survival set against the backdrop of the Mumbai underworld, weaving Shakespearean themes into a modern gangland saga.

trailer.title: Tu Yaa Main
trailer.synopsis: Tu Yaa Main (2026) is a survival thriller with a romantic core. Two strangers find themselves stranded in a hostile environment and must rely on each other to survive, discovering love amidst danger and chaos.

trailer.title: Assi
trailer.synopsis: Assi (2026) is a gripping drama-thriller starring Taapsee Pannu. Set in the lanes of Varanasi, the film explores themes of identity, resilience, and justice as a woman fights against a system stacked against her.

trailer.title: Do Deewane Seher Mein
trailer.synopsis: Do Deewane Seher Mein (2026) is a romantic drama directed by Ravi Udyawar. Two dreamers in Mumbai cross paths and discover that love isn't about finding the perfect person but about seeing imperfections perfectly.

trailer.title: Vadh 2
trailer.synopsis: Vadh 2 (2026) is a crime thriller sequel. An ordinary man pushed to extraordinary limits returns in this thrilling chapter, where moral boundaries blur and survival instincts take over in a dangerous cat-and-mouse game.

trailer.title: The Kerala Story 2
trailer.synopsis: The Kerala Story 2: Goes Beyond (2026) continues the dramatic saga, taking the narrative to an international level. The film delves deeper into the lives of its protagonists as they face new challenges and revelations across borders.

trailer.title: magdheera
trailer.synopsis: Harsha is falsely implicated for killing Indu's father and she too is kidnapped. But Harsha and Indu share a bond from a previous life, and when he realises this, he sets out to set things straight.
